TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Binding extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter))]
[<System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter))>]

summary.span: 代表某对象属性值和某控件属性值之间的简单绑定。

span.span: Represents the simple binding between the property value of an object and the property value of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类来创建和维护控件的属性和对象的属性之间的简单绑定，或对象列表中当前对象的属性。Use the class to create and maintain a simple binding between the property of a control and either the property of an object, or the property of the current object in a list of objects. 作为第一种情况的示例，可以将控件的 属性绑定 到 `FirstName` 对象的属性 `Customer` 。As an example of the first case, you can bind the property of a control to the `FirstName` property of a `Customer` object. 作为第二种情况的示例，可以将控件的 属性绑定 到 `FirstName` 包含客户的的属性 。As an example of the second case, you can bind the property of a control to the `FirstName` property of a that contains customers. 类还允许您设置值的格式，以便在 事件中显示，并通过事件检索格式化的值 。The class also enables you to format values for display through the event and to retrieve formatted values through the event. 构造 具有构造函数的实例时 ，必须指定三个项：When constructing a instance with constructor, you must specify three items: - 要绑定到的控件属性的名称。The name of the control property to bind to. - 数据源。The data source. - 解析为数据源中的列表或属性的导航路径。The navigation path that resolves to a list or property in the data source. 导航路径还用于创建对象的 属性。The navigation path is also used to create the object's property. 首先，必须指定要将数据绑定到的控件属性的名称。First, you must specify name of the control property you want to bind the data to. 例如，若要在控件中显示数据 ，请指定 属性。For example, to display data in a control, specify the property. 其次，您可以指定下表中的任何一个类的实例作为数据源。Second, you can specify an instance of any one of the classes in the following table as the data source. |说明Description|C# 示例C# example| |-----------------|-----------------| |实现或的任何 类 。Any class that implements or . 其中包括： 、 、 或 。These include the following: , , , or .|`DataSet ds = new DataSet("myDataSet");`| |任何实现的类， 用于创建对象的索引集合。Any class that implements to create an indexed collection of objects. 必须先创建并填充集合，然后才能创建 。The collection must be created and filled before creating the . 列表中的对象必须具有相同的类型;否则，将引发异常。The objects in the list must all be of the same type; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.|`ArrayList ar1 = new ArrayList; Customer1 cust1 = new Customer("Louis"); ar1.Add(cust1);`| |强类型化 对象的强类型化A strongly typed of strongly typed objects|`Customer [] custList = new Customer[3];`| 第三，您必须指定导航路径，该路径可以是空字符串 ( "" ) 、单个属性名或以句点分隔的名称的层次结构。Third, you must specify the navigation path, which can be an empty string (""), a single property name, or a period-delimited hierarchy of names. 如果将导航路径设置为空字符串，则 将对基础数据源对象调用方法。If you set the navigation path to an empty string, the method will be called on the underlying data source object. 如果数据源是一个 ，它可以包含多个 对象，则必须使用导航路径解析为特定的列。If the data source is a , which can contain multiple objects, the navigation path must be used to resolve to a specific column. > [!NOTE] > 如果数据源是 、 或 ，则实际上是绑定到 。When the data source is a , , or , you are actually binding to a . 因此，绑定行实际上是 对象。Consequently, the bound rows are actually objects. 如果将数据源设置为包含多个 (对象的对象（例如或) ），则需要用句点分隔的导航路径 。A period-delimited navigation path is required when the data source is set to an object that contains multiple objects (such as a or ). 绑定到属性返回对其他 (对象的引用的对象（例如具有返回其他类对象) 的属性的类）时，还可以使用以句点分隔的导航路径。You can also use a period-delimited navigation path when you bind to an object whose properties return references to other objects (such as a class with properties that return other class objects). 例如，以下导航路径都描述了有效的数据字段：For example, the following navigation paths all describe valid data fields: - "大小高度""Size.Height" - "供应商. 公司名称""Suppliers.CompanyName" - "RegionsToCustomers. CustomerFirstName""Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" - "RegionsToCustomers. customersToOrders. ordersToDetails""Regions.regionsToCustomers.customersToOrders.ordersToDetails.Quantity" 路径的每个成员都可以返回一个属性，该属性可解析为单个值 (例如整数) 或值列表 (如) 的字符串数组。Each member of the path can return either a property that resolves to a single value (such as an integer), or a list of values (such as an array of strings). 尽管路径中的每个成员都可以是列表或属性，但最终成员必须解析为属性。Although each member in the path can be a list or property, the final member must resolve to a property. 每个成员都是在上一个成员上生成的： "Size，Height" 解析为 当前的属性 ;"RegionsToCustomers. CustomerFirstName" 解析为当前客户的名字，其中客户是当前区域的客户之一。Each member builds on the previous member: "Size.Height" resolves to the property for the current ; "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" resolves to the first name for the current customer, where the customer is one of the customers for the current region. 返回值的列表，方法是将其中一项链接 到中的第二个值 。A returns a list of values by linking one to a second in a . 如果 包含 对象，则可以将数据成员指定为 后跟 ，然后是 。If the contains objects, you can specify the data member as a followed by a , and then a . 例如，如果命名的 "供应商" 包含 名为 "suppliers2products" 的，则该数据成员可以是 "suppliers2products"。For example, if the named "Suppliers" contains a named "suppliers2products", the data member could be "Suppliers.suppliers2products.ProductName". 数据源可以包含一组相关的类。The data source can consist of a set of related classes. 例如，假设有一组目录为太阳系的类。For example, imagine a set of classes that catalogs solar systems. 名为的类 `System` 包含一个名为 `Stars` 的属性，该属性返回对象的集合 `Star` 。The class named `System` contains a property named `Stars` that returns a collection of `Star` objects. 每个 `Star` 对象都具有 `Name` 和 `Mass` 属性，以及 `Planets` 返回对象集合的属性 `Planet` 。Each `Star` object has `Name` and `Mass` properties, as well as a `Planets` property that returns a collection of `Planet` objects. 在此系统中，每个行星还具有 `Mass` 和 `Name` 属性。In this system, each planet also has `Mass` and `Name` properties. 每个 `Planet` 对象都有一个 `Moons` 属性，该属性返回 `Moon` 对象的集合，其中每个对象都具有 `Name` 和 `Mass` 属性。Each `Planet` object further has a `Moons` property that returns a collection of `Moon` objects, each of which also has `Name` and `Mass` properties. 如果指定 `System` 对象作为数据源，则可以指定以下任意项作为数据成员：If you specify a `System` object as the data source, you can specify any of the following as the data member: - "Stars.Name""Stars.Name" - "星星""Stars.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Name""Stars.Planets.Name" - "星星""Stars.Planets.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Name""Stars.Planets.Moons.Name" - "星星. 月球""Stars.Planets.Moons.Mass" 可成为简单绑定功能的控件是 中的对象集合 ，可通过控件的属性访问这些对象 。Controls that can be simple-bound feature a collection of objects in a , which you can access through the control's property. 您可以 通过调用方法向集合添加 ，从而将控件的属性绑定到对象的属性 (或绑定到列表) 中的当前对象的属性。You add a to the collection by calling the method, thereby binding a property of the control to a property of an object (or to a property of the current object in a list). 您可以简单地绑定到从类派生的任何对象 ，例如以下 Windows 控件：You can simple-bind to any object that derives from the class, for example, the following Windows controls: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 只有 、和控件的属性 为简单绑定。Only the property of the , , and control is simple bound. 类是一个抽象类，用于管理 特定数据源和数据成员的所有对象。The class is an abstract class that manages all the objects for a particular data source and data member. 派生自的类 是 和 类。Classes that derive from are the and the classes. 如何 管理取决于 是列表绑定还是属性绑定。How a is managed depends on whether the is a list binding or a property binding. 例如，如果它是一个列表绑定，则可以使用在 列表中指定， 因此，将 确定哪些项 (从列表中的所有项中) 实际上绑定到控件。For example, if it is a list binding, you can use the to specify a in the list; the , therefore, determines which item (out of all items in the list) is actually bound to a control. 若要返回合适的 ，请使用 。To return the appropriate , use the . 若要将新行添加到绑定到相同的一组控件 ，请使用 类的方法 。To add a new row to a set of controls bound to the same , use the method of the class. 使用 类的属性 可返回相应的 。Use the property of the class to return the appropriate . 若要对添加新行进行转义，请使用 方法。To escape the addition of the new row, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 Windows 窗体，其中包含多个演示简单数据绑定的控件。The following code example creates a Windows Form with several controls that demonstrate simple data binding. 该示例创建一个 具有两个名为 `Customers` 和 `Orders` 的表以及一个 名为的 `custToOrders` 。The example creates a with two tables named `Customers` and `Orders`, and a named `custToOrders`. 四个控件 (a 和三个 控件) 将数据绑定到表中的列。Four controls (a and three controls) are data bound to columns in the tables. 对于每个控件，该示例通过属性创建和添加 到控件中 。For each control, the example creates and adds a to the control through the property. 该示例 通过窗体的为每个表返回一个 。The example returns a for each table through the form's . 四个 控件递增或递减 对象上的属性 。Four controls increment or decrement the property on the objects. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以为数据源指定以下任意类的实例：You can specify an instance of any of the following classes for the data source: - - - - - - 实现接口的任何类 Any class that implements the interface - 任何类Any class 有关 创建字符串的详细信息，请参阅 `dataMember` 类。See the class for more information about creating the `dataMember` string. 创建到控件的属性的绑定时，新的将 检查绑定控件公开的事件，并附加到两个特定事件：When you create a binding to a control's property, the new inspects the events exposed by the bound control and attaches to two particular events: - - 名为*PropertyName*的事件 `Changed` (例如， ) An event named *PropertyName*`Changed` (for example, ) 如果尝试绑定到不存在的属性，则会在将 添加到控件的集合时引发 。If you attempt to bind to a property that does not exist, an will be thrown when the is added to the control's collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件绑定到指定的中的表列 `myDataSet` 。The following code example binds a control to a table column in a named `myDataSet`. 该示例要求您已 `myDataSet` 在模块的 "声明" 部分中声明。The example requires that you have declared `myDataSet` in the declarations section of the module. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 属性设置为 且完成绑定操作（如将数据从控件推到数据源或与之相反的操作）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property is set to and a binding operation is complete, such as when data is pushed from the control to the data source or vice versa.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为，则在以下任何条件下引发此 事件 `true` ：This event is raised under any of the following conditions when is `true`: - 数据源中的数据被推送到控件属性上。Data from the data source is pushed onto the control property. - 控件属性中的数据被推送到数据源。Data from the control property is pushed onto the data source. 此事件在完成这些操作时引发，与完成状态无关。This event is raised at the completion of these operations, independent of the completion status. 例如，如果绑定操作将 null 值绑定到 属性，则会引发异常，但 仍会发生该事件。For example, if a binding operation binds a null value to a property, an exception is thrown, but the event still occurs. 此事件的处理程序可以根据绑定过程中的成功、错误或异常，采取相应的操作，方法是检查 参数的属性 。The handler of this event can take the appropriate action, based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the property of the parameter. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. summary.span: 当将某控件的属性绑定到某个数据值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is bound to a data value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据从数据源推送到控件中时，将引发事件。The event is raised when data is pushed from the data source into the control. 可以处理该 事件，将未格式化的数据从数据源转换为要显示的格式化数据。You can handle the event to convert unformatted data from the data source into formatted data for display. 将数据从控件请求到数据源时，将 引发事件以 unformat 显示的值，然后 发生事件以便重新设置要显示的数据的格式。When data is pulled from the control into the data source, the event is raised to unformat the displayed value, then the event occurs to reformat the data for display. 这可确保绑定控件显示格式正确的数据，而不管用户是否在控件中输入已设置格式或未格式化的数据。This ensures that the bound control displays correctly formatted data regardless of whether the user enters formatted or unformatted data in the control. 和 事件允许您创建用于显示数据的自定义格式。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果表中的数据是类型 ，则可以通过将 的属性设置 为事件中的格式化值，以本地货币格式显示数据 。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can display the data in the local currency format by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此，必须 unformat 事件中显示的值 。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 只要更改的值，就会发生此事件 ，其中包括：The event occurs whenever the value of the changes, which includes: - 第一次绑定属性时。The first time the property is bound. - 任何时间 发生更改。Any time the changes. - 只要对数据绑定列表进行排序或筛选，就会在提供列表时完成此操作 。Whenever the data-bound list is sorted or filtered, which is accomplished when a supplies the list. 事件 也会在事件之后发生 。The event also occurs after the event. 例如，当控件失去焦点时，将分析其内容。For example, when a control loses focus, its contents are parsed. 此后，当新数据推送到控件中时，将 发生事件，从而允许对新内容进行格式设置。Immediately afterward, as new data is pushed into the control, the event occurs allowing the new contents to be formatted. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，将 委托添加到 和 事件，并通过属性将添加 到 控件的 。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and adds the to the of a control through the property. `DecimalToCurrencyString`添加到事件中的事件委托 ，使用方法将绑定值的格式 ( 类型) 为货币 。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, added to the event, formats the bound value (a type) as currency using the method. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`添加到事件中的事件委托 将控件显示的值转换回 类型。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. 此示例假定存在一个 名为的 `ds` 。This example assumes the presence of a named `ds`. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if type conversion and formatting of control property data is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为，则 `true` 还会启用错误处理行为，并 引发事件。Setting this property to `true` also enables error-handling behavior and causes the event to be raised. 此事件的处理程序可以根据绑定过程中的成功、错误或异常，采取相应的操作，方法是检查 参数的属性 。The handler of this event can take the appropriate action, based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the property of the parameter.

span.span: if the binding is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绑定在满足以下条件时处于活动状态：A binding is active when it meets these conditions: - 设置其所有属性。All its properties are set. - 用户未对所属的调用 或 。The user did not call or on the that the belongs to. - 已创建所属的控件 。The control to which the belongs has been created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 在窗体上打印每个的和值。The following code example prints the and value for each on a form. summary.span: 获取或设置当数据源包含 值时，作为控件属性设置的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to be set as the control property when the data source contains a value.

value.span: 当数据源包含 值时，作为控件属性设置的 。

span.span: The to be set as the control property when the data source contains a value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源必须包含， 才能正确应用属性。The data source must contain for the property to be correctly applied. 如果数据源类型为类型（如字符串或整数），则 将忽略属性的值。If the data source type is a type such as a string or integer the value of the property will be ignored. 此外， 如果将属性设置为，则忽略该属性 `null` 。Also, the property is ignored if it is set to `null`. 如果将控件属性设置为的对象，则会向数据源中添加 null 值 。A null value will be added to the data source when the control property is set to the object of . 如果 设置为字符串值，则比较不区分大小写。If is set to a string value, comparisons are case-insensitive.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 在数据绑定控件的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of a data-bound control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 事件允许您创建用于显示数据的自定义格式。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果表中的数据是类型 ，则可以通过将 的属性设置 为事件中的格式化值，以本地货币格式显示数据 。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can display the data in the local currency format by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此，必须 unformat 事件中显示的值 。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 事件发生在下列情况下：The event occurs under the following conditions: - 发生事件后 。After the event of the occurs. - 调用的 方法时 。When the method of the is called. - 换言之，当更改 ) 时，更改 ( 。When the of the changes (in other words, when the changes). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，将 委托添加到 和 事件，并通过属性将添加 到 控件的 。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and adds the to the of a control through the property. `DecimalToCurrencyString`添加到事件中的事件委托 ，使用方法将绑定值的格式 ( 类型) 为货币 。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, added to the event, formats the bound value (a type) as currency using the method. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`添加到事件中的事件委托 将控件显示的值转换回 类型。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Parse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Parse Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Parse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Parse Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Parse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Parse Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取控件的数据绑定属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the control's data-bound property.

value.span: 要绑定到的控件属性的名称。

span.span: The name of a control property to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 指定要绑定到数据源中的列表的控件属性。Use the to specify the control property that you want to bind to a list in a data source. 最常见的情况是绑定显示属性（如 控件的属性） 。Most commonly, you bind a display property such as the property of a control. 但是，由于可以绑定控件的任何属性，因此可以使用数据库中的数据以编程方式在运行时创建控件。However, because you can bind any property of a control, you can programmatically create controls at run time using data from a database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 为窗体上的每个控件打印各自的值。The following code example prints the value of each for each control on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
